# Problem 1
## Create data frame

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

p1_df = tibble(
  random_sample = runif(n = 10, min = 0, max = 5),
  vec_char = c("This", "is", "trying", "to", "answer", "question", "1", "of", "homework", "1"),
  vec_logical = c(random_sample > 2),
  vec_factor = factor(c("right", "right", "left", "right", "left", "right", "right", "left", "right", "left"))
)
```
